duas.title: Dua for Guidance
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the accursed devil.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me.

duas.title: Dua for Success
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسالك من فضلك ورحمتك
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your bounty and mercy.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harm
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with Whose name nothing on earth or in the heavens can harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Anxiety
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow.

duas.title: Dua for Health
duas.arabic: اللهم اشفني شفاءً لا يغادر سقماً
duas.translation: O Allah, heal me with a healing that leaves no sickness.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Poverty
duas.arabic: اللهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك واغنني بفضلك عن من سواك
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with Your lawful provisions and keep me away from unlawful ones, and enrich me with Your grace.

duas.title: Dua for Good Health
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me health and wellness.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر ما عملت ومن شر ما لم أعمل
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and the evil of what I have not done.

duas.title: Dua for the Sick
duas.arabic: اللهم رب الناس أذهب الباس، اشفِ أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal, for You are the Healer, and there is no healing except Your healing.

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Difficulties
duas.arabic: اللهم لا سهل إلا ما جعلته سهلاً
duas.translation: O Allah, there is no ease except that which You make easy.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge.

duas.title: Dua for Safety from Calamities
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الجوع، فإنه بئس الضجيع
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from hunger, for it is an evil companion.

duas.title: Dua for Blessings in Sustenance
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my sustenance.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Enemies
duas.arabic: اللهم احفظني من بين يدي ومن خلفي
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from what is before me and behind me.

duas.title: Dua for Steadfastness
duas.translation: O Allah, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

duas.title: Dua for Parents
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents.

duas.title: Dua for Good Character
duas.translation: O Allah, improve our character.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Influences
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شرور الناس
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evils of people.

duas.title: Dua for Making Things Easy
duas.translation: O Allah, make my affairs easy for me.

duas.title: Dua for Asking for Allah’s Mercy
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy upon me with Your power.

duas.title: Dua for Strength in Faith
duas.translation: O Allah, make me firm in my faith.

duas.title: Dua for Happiness
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me happiness.

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Refuge from Discontent
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الكفر والفقر
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty.

duas.title: Dua for Calmness of Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, make my heart tranquil with Your remembrance.

duas.title: Dua for Light in the Heart
duas.translation: O Allah, place light in my heart.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Stress
duas.translation: O Allah, relieve me of my worry.

duas.title: Dua for Peace in the Home
duas.translation: O Allah, make my home a blessed home.

duas.title: Dua for Protection in Journey
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسالك في سفري هذا البر والتقوى
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for righteousness and piety during this journey.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Arrogance
duas.translation: O Allah, protect me from the evil of my own soul.

duas.title: Dua for Avoiding Sin
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من كل معصية
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from every sin.

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Financial Stress
duas.translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your sustenance.

duas.title: Dua for Overcoming Fear
duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخوف
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear.

duas.title: Dua for Patience
duas.translation: O Allah, make me of the patient ones.
